name: Avoid unreferenced Process Groups (TIBCO BW)
description: This metric retrieves all Tibco Process Groups that are not referenced i.e. not used by Tibco code.
output:
This report lists all Number of Tibco Process Groups that are not referenced.
It provides the following information:
Tibco Process Groups full name
rationale: Unreferenced Process Groups like any other example of dead code make maintenance more difficult and more expensive.
remediation: Check if the Process Groups are going to be used. If not, then remove them.
